bibl.title: Letter from L. Osgood to Howard A. Kelly, September 19, [1907]

div1.p: Osgood sends a contribution for Kissinger.

div1.head: Letter from L. Osgood to Howard A. Kelly, September 19, [1907]
div1.opener:
ack.
Sep, 19 485 CENTRAL PARK WEST
NEW YORK.
My dear Mr. Kelly,
div1.p:
I enclose
check for $1000 for
John R. Kissinger, it
comes from a very old
Lady, Mrs. Parmeksky.
The little gift is due to
the notice of Mr. K- in
the Outlook of June 29,
and springs from appreci-
ation of his manliness and
bravery in assisting his
wife in her work of
supporting the family,
even after he was con-
fined to an invalid's
chair.
